author: SiewYan
body:
#### PR description:

The concurrent version of ExternalLHEProducer is implemented for GEN workflows, LHE production + Hadronization mode.

  - No changed in output; expects improved CPU time.
  - None
  - https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/WorkBookGenMultithread#Concurrent_ExternalLHEProducer
  - https://indico.cern.ch/event/894534/contributions/3827060/attachments/2030893/3398914/ExternalGeneratorFilter_for_Generators_Meeting.pdf
  - https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/25090#issuecomment-818987732

#### PR validation:

Ran on several workflow from relval_generator, relval_extendedgen with `--nThreads 4`, and it is a success.
title: implement concurrent ExternalLHEProducer technique
